createLearningGoal.titleRequiredValidationError: A learning goal needs to have a title
createLearningGoal.titleMaxLengthValidationError: A learning goal title is limited to 255 characters
createLearningGoal.titleUniqueValidationError: There already exists a learning goal with this title in the course

learningGoalCard.connectedLectureUnitsExplanation: The following lecture units are connected to this learning goal:
learningGoalCard.lectureUnitsForCalculation: Lecture Units Used in Progress Calculation
learningGoalCard.lectureUnitsForCalculationExplanation: The following lecture units are used to calculate your progress in this learning goal

delete.question: Do you really want to delete the learning goal {{ title }}? You can not undo this action!
delete.typeNameToConfirm: Please enter the name of the learning goal for confirmation.

learningGoalCard.progressUnavailable: Progress calculation is currently only available for learning goals connected to exercise units.
learningGoalCard.totalPointsAchievableExplanation: You could have achieved a maximum of {{ points }} points
learningGoalCard.progressExplanation: Therefore your progress is about {{ progress }}%

learningGoalPopover.noLearningGoals: No learning goals are connected with this lecture unit!
